# instanceCapacity

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of instances this low-level instance data draws when set on a mesh instances component.

## Declaration

```swift
final var instanceCapacity: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelInstanceData/instanceCount] must be less than or equal to the `instanceCapacity` determined on initialization.
title: instanceCapacity
